name: Terminal Hacker
description: Welcome to Terminal Hacker, you must crack as many passwords as you can before you get locked out of the terminal. Terminal Hacker features 3 different gamemodes with four difficulties, and leaderboards.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP+ Processor: 1.2GHz Processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel Graphics 4000 or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 201 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is not good. Literally all you do is press random buttons until you get the right answer. Avoid this game, do something else with your time.
A good game to practice english.
